generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, with vehicles and cyclists on it.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible on both sides of the road, separated by curbs and poles, with people walking on them.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalks.
- rider: Two individuals are riding bicycles on the road.
- car: A black SUV is visible driving ahead in the center of the road.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a "30" speed limit sign and a "TAXI" sign.
- pole: Several poles are visible, supporting traffic signs and possibly streetlights.
- terrain: Small patches of grass and soil are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and road.
